'''''The Lord of the Rings Millennium Edition''''' is an edition of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''. This version is unique as it contains 7 volumes, one for each of the Books plus the Appendices. The UK version of this set contains an audio CD of the Professor reading from the books (while the audio has been published before, the quality has been improved).

==Volumes==
# [[The Fellowship of the Ring#Book I|Book I: The Ring Sets Out]]
# [[The Fellowship of the Ring#Book II|Book II: The Ring Goes South]]
# [[The Two Towers#Book III|Book III: The Treason of Isengard]]
# [[The Two Towers#Book IV|Book IV: The Ring Goes East]]
# [[The Return of the King#Book V|Book V: The War of the Ring]]
# [[The Return of the King#Book VI|Book VI: The End of the Third Age]]
# [[The Lord of the Rings Appendices|Appendices]]
